alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 8:18PM EST until February 05 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Flint River near Griffin Hwy. 16 affecting Fayette and Spalding Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Flint River near Griffin Hwy. 16. * WHEN...Until early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands, fields and pasture upstream and downstream from the gage on Georgia Highway 16 or Newnan Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EST Friday the stage was 11.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 12 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage thereafter. - Flood stage is 12 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
